EmailTemplate.description: When Homecharge Install SA "Customer Confirmation" checkbox becomes True
EmailTemplate.name: Homecharge Confirmation Email (Automated)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Pod Point Installation Date is Confirmed {!WorkOrder.Reference_Id__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Your install is confirmed:
{!WorkOrder.Scheduled_Start_Date__c}
Your installer will arrive between:
{!WorkOrder.Arrival_Window_Start_Time__c} and {!WorkOrder.Arrival_Window_End_Time__c}
(an installation typically takes around 2 hours to complete)
Want to change your date instead? Just reply to this email and let us know.
Thanks,
The Pod Point Team
